title: Which Champion Should I Get?
body:
Hi,

I am thinking about buying a champion costing 6300 IP. Can you guys help me pick which one? I like mage and long ranged champions!

replies.body: syndra is a heap of fun and although she's not very popular she is super strong when u get good enough at her. the key is to get the combos right and once you've mastered them a whole legion can't stop you ehehe{{champion:134}}
Currently, I'd say Brand. With DFT keystone and a Liandries he does absolutely insane damage at a pretty huge range.
tf is cheap, strong, and sort of long ranged atm.
Hmmm mage and long ranged.....Vel'koz, Syndra, Azir, Zyra all are very good midlaners if that's your style
Why did no one mention Orianna (I know shes 4800IP) But, she is a Ranged and AP and very good in team fights(max q if you pick orianna.)
Thank you guys for commenting, I will take your suggestions into my head.

6300 AP Champions: Lissandra, Elise, Ekko (melee), Diana (melee), Syndra, Velkoz, Zyra.

Of those, probably Syndra or Velkoz fit your "long range mage" style

I'd suggest if you want a long range AP mage {{champion:101}}  is your boy. Only costs 4800
